fields.description:
This would fix two issues, namely:

* We currently {{require()}} all platform level Javascript using a top level file name, which potentially conflicts with user code
* We need a unique identifier for TiStudio to filter our platform stack frames with
fields.summary: Android: Use the "ti:/" prefix for all platform Javascript files

comments.body:
Verified as Fixed in 1.8.0.1.
SDK: 1.8.0.1.RC3
Android Runtimes: V8/Rhino
Studio: 1.0.7.201112152014
Devices Tested: Android Emulator 2.2, Xoom 3.2.1, iPhone Simulator 5.0
Closing bug. Already verified fix on 1.8.0.1
